Title: Speak of the Devil
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Christos N. Gage, Ruth Fletcher, Luke Kalteux (story editor), Christos N. Gage (staff writer), Ruth Fletcher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Toby Leonard Moore
Plot: When Fisk gains the upper hand, the goal to destroy him becomes even more difficult, while Daredevil faces his own demons.
